CHAT.comment: child helps INV uncover computer box.
child touches computer box.
mom laughs.
computer box makes noises.
child grabs mom's hand and brings her over to computer box.
computer box beeps.
mom and child laugh.
lights on computer box start flashing and mom and child give each other surprised looks.
computer box makes noises.
child pushes sensors on computer box.
child looks at mom and mom laughs.
computer box beeps and child looks at mom.
mom touches sensor on computer box.
child points to middle sensor on computer box.
child touches sensor and all of the lights on the computer box light up.
child shows her mom where to touch the computer box to get it to light up.
child gives mom a hug.
child pushes sensors and computer box beeps.
child walks away from computer box and then comes back.
INV covers up computer box.
INV and child uncover starfish tank.
mom and child are not in the picture.
child and mom nods their head yes.
INV covers up starfish tank.
INV leaves the room.
INV enters room with Robodog.
child touches Robodog.
mom laughs.
child sneezes and has to blow her nose.
child picks up Robodog by the ear.
child pick up Robodog and turns Robodog around.
child pushes a button on Robodog's tail and Robodog sits down.
Robodog starts moving.
mom laughs.
child pushes button on Robodog and gets Robodog to move and stretch.
child pushes button on Robodog.
mom and child talk to Robodog.
child pushes button on top of Robodog's head.
INV removes Robodog from the room.
INV enters room with car.
mom and child roll car back and forth to each other.
mom rolls car almost out of child's reach.
child rolls car out of mom's reach.
mom laughs.
mom and child roll car back and forth.
mom and child roll car back and forth.
child tries to put car under the couch.
mom and child roll car back and forth.
child points at the computer box.
mom points to starfish tank.
child covers her nose as if she is going to sneeze.
INV removes car from room.
INV enters room with meerkat.
child begins making monkey noises.
child makes more monkey noises.
mom makes meerkat kiss child.
mom looks on meerkat's tag for a name.
child takes off her necklace and puts it on meerkat.
child put necklace around her neck and meerkat's neck and stands up.
mom puts meerkat on couch and meerkat falls off of couch.
child makes noises while throwing the meerkat up in the air and catching the meerkat.
mom talks to meerkat and shakes meerkat's paw.
mom shakes meerkat's paw.
child puts her necklace on door handle.
child plays with her necklace.
mom laughs.
INV removes meerkat from the room.
INV enters room with degu.
mom and child are not in the picture.
mom talks to degu.
child points to cover on degu cage.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child talk to degu.
child taps on degu's cage.
child claps.
child covers her nose as if she is going to sneeze.
mom and child laugh.
